Articles.Content: sometimes when I create a Manoeuvre node it says the burn time will be 4 days 3 hours but its never that long and it is really annoying. it happens even when I use stock KSP parts. and it is always 4 days 3 hours, no variations. so I installed the mod kerbal flight engineer and it always shows the correct burn time but I can't press the warp button on the manoeuvre thing so I have to eyeball it and its really annoying. any suggestions on what I should do?
